title: JakobFugger
author: JakobFugger
content: https://trends.aax.com/important-update-forward-through-adversity"In light of the insolvency of one of our industry’s largest players last week, crypto users are rightfully concerned about the operational and financial stability of centralized digital asset exchanges. "So they decided to suspend withdrawals putting more panic in the market.... This is getting real bad

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: JakobFugger on November 14, 2022, 02:07:07 PMSo they decided to suspend withdrawals putting more panic in the market.... This is getting real badExchange with 0.1 score on CMC in 0-10 scale with little to zero real users, with 99.9% fake volume, that looks super scammy will not put any more panic in the market no matter what will it do. Everyone expected it to fail sooner or later. Everyone who knew about that exchange... not that many people did.

comments.author: S A KHAIR
comments.body: Although they only announced maintenance and system upgrade, but if they crash, it won't affect the market. AAX exchange is not a very influential exchange in the market with a fairly low trading volume. If causing the next panic in the market, crypto.com could be next. They are having proof of reserve crash, if crypto.com crashes, it really causes serious problem.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Never heard of that exchange. However larger exchanges like cryptocom and gate are going thru a large bank run. So far there is massive amount of withdraws from those 2 exchanges. Lots of fud which could be true or not.If cryptocom is still processing withdraws in a week then I would say it had the right amount of reserves. However lately what is going on with their moving ETH around back and forth and sending to wrong address. It’s better to be safe than sorry.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on November 14, 2022, 02:21:46 PMExchange with 0.1 score on CMC in 0-10 scale with little to zero real users, with 99.9% fake volume, that looks super scammy will not put any more panic in the market no matter what will it do. Everyone expected it to fail sooner or later. Everyone who knew about that exchange... not that many people did.I think this should be more of a lesson that we should not hold on exchanges, but as a trader, going for one of the first 10 exchanges would be good? Yet what happened to FTX which was the second crypto exchange was surprising, which means we still just have to conclude that if it is not your key, it is not your coin, same goes to Binance, OKX and other ranked exchanges, that we should not hold on an exchange.

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: JakobFugger on November 14, 2022, 02:07:07 PMhttps://trends.aax.com/important-update-forward-through-adversity"In light of the insolvency of one of our industry’s largest players last week, crypto users are rightfully concerned about the operational and financial stability of centralized digital asset exchanges. "So they decided to suspend withdrawals putting more panic in the market.... This is getting real badI want to know the reason why AAX exchange made a suspension on their withdrawal? Even though the AAX exchange is not experiencing any problems at this time and AAX is also not related to the FTX case that has been going on and is still going viral until now. And if the AAX exchange makes a suspension for no apparent reason, the exchange users will obviously experience a panic because they cannot withdraw assets.
